hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jvdraw.model

Class GeomObjDrawingModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jvdraw.model.GeomObjDrawingModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingModel

    public class GeomObjDrawingModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawingModel
    Class used to hold all the components that the user has drawn. It provides the methods to update and remove the components and each time some change happens all the registered listeners are informed about it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB
